devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>Olivier Van Den Biggelaar - <olivier@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Contract storing the state of wallets related to guardians and lock. The contract only defines basic setters and getters with no logic. Only modules authorised for a wallet can modify its state.

addGuardian(address,address).details: Lets an authorised module add a guardian to a wallet.

getGuardians(address).details: Gets the list of guaridans for a wallet.

getLock(address).details: Gets the time at which the lock of a wallet will release.
getLock(address).return: the time at which the lock of a wallet will release, or zero if there is no lock set.

getLocker(address).details: Gets the address of the last module that modified the lock for a wallet.
getLocker(address).return: the address of the last module that modified the lock for a wallet.

guardianCount(address).details: Returns the number of guardians for a wallet.

isGuardian(address,address).details: Checks if an account is a guardian for a wallet.
isGuardian(address,address).return: true if the account is a guardian for a wallet.

isLocked(address).details: Checks if the lock is set for a wallet.
isLocked(address).return: true if the lock is set for the wallet.

revokeGuardian(address,address).details: Lets an authorised module revoke a guardian from a wallet.

setLock(address,uint256).details: Lets an authorised module set the lock for a wallet.

params._releaseAfter: The epoch time at which the lock should automatically release.

devdoc.title: GuardianStorage
